applications
Class Option

java.lang.Object
  applications.Option

public class Option
extends java.lang.Object

Class to store information about an option.

Typical usage:

Option myOption = new Option("Uses extended mode.", "E", 0, "-E"));

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Eibe Frank (eibe@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
